metadata.title: About BAPI | BAPI
metadata.description: Learn about BAPI's 40+ year history manufacturing precision sensor solutions for building automation systems worldwide.

hero.title: Building Automation Products Inc.
hero.subtitle: Precision Sensor Solutions for Building Automation
hero.description: For over 40 years, BAPI has been a leading manufacturer of precision sensors for building automation systems, trusted by engineers worldwide.

overview.title: About BAPI
overview.paragraph1: Building Automation Products, Inc. (BAPI) was formed in 1993 from its parent company BEMCO, Inc., which was founded in 1983. Since then, BAPI has grown into a global manufacturer of precision sensors that improve building automation systems and are critical to saving energy. Every BAPI product is designed and manufactured at our headquarters in Gays Mills, Wisconsin, surrounded by the natural beauty of the rolling hills of the Driftless Region.
overview.paragraph2: At BAPI, quality and reliability are at the core of everything we do.  Our sensor products are trusted by engineers worldwide for mission-critical facilities including hospitals, data centers, clean rooms, laboratories, and commercial buildings. With over 600 product models, NIST-traceable calibration, BACnet® certification, and ISO 9001:2015 manufacturing standards, BAPI delivers precision you can depend on.

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: Industry-leading warranties, NIST-traceable precision instruments, and 100% product testing at every stage of manufacturing.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Dedicated technical support team with deep product knowledge and real-world building automation experience.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously developing new solutions like wireless monitoring, cloud connectivity, and BACnet integration.

globalPresence.title: Global Presence
globalPresence.description: Manufacturing and distribution facilities across three continents serving customers worldwide.

metadata.title: Careers | BAPI
metadata.description: Join the BAPI team and help us shape the future of building automation technology.

hero.title: Build Your Career at BAPI
hero.description: BAPI supports a culture of work-life balance with family oriented employee benefits such as company picnics & holiday parties, aesthetic wellness initiatives, exercise programs and much more. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOP) and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment for all employees.

healthInsurance.description: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision coverage for you and your family.

compensation.title: Competitive Compensation

paidHolidays.title: Paid Holidays
paidHolidays.description: Generous paid time off including holidays, vacation days, and personal time.

retirement.title: 401(k) Match
retirement.description: Company match on retirement contributions to help secure your future.

lifeInsurance.title: Life Insurance
lifeInsurance.description: Company-paid life insurance coverage with options for additional coverage.

development.title: Professional Development
development.description: Continuous learning opportunities, training programs, and career advancement.

items.shortTerm: Short and Long-Term Disability through AFLAC

applicationProcess.title: How to Apply
applicationProcess.description: We ONLY accept and consider complete electronic applications submitted directly through the www.bapihvac.com/careers webpage.

step1.title: Complete Application
step1.description: Most positions will require a Resume and a separate Cover Letter to be considered a "complete" electronic application.

step2.title: Direct Submission
step2.description: Cover Letters must be uploaded directly as attachments via online application system.

step3.title: Equal Opportunity
step3.description: BAPI is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOP). If you are unable to apply online or require alternative methods of application or screening, please identify cultural origin, disability or veteran status.

applicationProcess.contactTitle: For questions or help with online applications:

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Mission?

metadata.title: Mission & Values | BAPI
metadata.description: Learn about BAPI's mission, vision, and core values that drive our commitment to precision sensor solutions.

hero.title: Mission & Values
hero.description: For over 30 years, our mission and values have guided every decision we make, every product we design, and every customer relationship we build.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: At BAPI, we design, manufacture and deliver high quality sensor solutions, as well as provide high quality services for our business partners to effectively save their customers money and energy, therefore reducing dependency on natural resources.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To grow as a global, innovative leader by providing unique, customer driven solutions while inspiring our employees to be their best, delivering quality products and services that exceed our customers' expectations.

coreValuesSection.title: Our Core Values
coreValuesSection.description: These principles guide everything we do and shape the way we serve our customers and support our team.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We value our employees by encouraging open dialogue, a sense of community and work-life balance for a healthy culture.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We value processes and services that are metric driven to continually exceed our customers' expectations.

partnership.title: Collaborative Partnership
partnership.description: We value new and improved solutions that are creative and unique, we continue to find ways to provide distinct advantages.

integrity.title: Integrity & Ethics
integrity.description: We value our collaborative partnerships that lead to superior solutions and facilitate healthy, productive, and comfortable environments.

employees.title: Employees
employees.description: We value being deliberate, thoughtful and intentional with behaviors that match our every word.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.description: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our values and passion for innovation. Explore opportunities to join the BAPI team.

metadata.title: Why BAPI | BAPI
metadata.description: Discover what sets BAPI apart in the building automation industry and why engineers trust our precision sensor solutions.

hero.title: Why BAPI?
hero.description: BAPI has been changing the way you think about sensors since 1993. We believe sensors are not simple commodities—they are integral to building automation systems and critical to saving energy.

warranty.title: 5-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Our products are designed and manufactured to last. We back up that claim by offering a 5-year warranty across all our products.

guarantee.title: BAPI-Backed Guarantee
guarantee.description: Most sensor manufacturers will replace their defective products, but only BAPI has the confidence to provide a product warranty.

lifetime.title: Lifetime Limited Warranty
lifetime.description: A lifetime limited warranty is also available on many of our single point, room and non-room sensor models.

testing.title: 100% Testing
testing.description: Each and every BAPI product is tested at multiple stages in the manufacturing process to ensure precision and reliability.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: At BAPI, we strive to be leaders in our industry by providing innovative, high quality products and services designed with you in mind.

original.title: Another Original
original.description: Products displaying the "Another Original" stamp are unique to BAPI and inspired by our customers, employees and vendors.

qualitySection.title: The Extra Steps We Take
qualitySection.description: In addition to our exceptional people, BAPI uses only the highest quality sensing elements and meticulous manufacturing, testing and quality assurance procedures.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the BAPI Difference?
cta.description: Let's discuss how our precision sensor solutions can benefit your next project. Our team is ready to help you find the perfect solution.

taglines: Changing the way you think about sensors since 1993
Seamless wireless integration for your existing BAS

categories.title: Explore Our Product Catalog
categories.subtitle: Browse by sensor type to find the perfect solution for your building automation project

whyBapi.title: WHY BAPI?
whyBapi.description: BAPI has been changing the way you think about sensors since 1993. We believe sensors are not just simple commodities. They are integral to a building automation controls system and critical to the mission of saving energy. Our commitment to innovation and quality has helped transform BAPI into a leading global manufacturer of sensor solutions with a tremendous focus on quality, reliability and value.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.description: Our products are designed and manufactured to last. We back up that claim by offering a 5-year warranty across all of our products.
warranty.footnote: A lifetime limited warranty is also available on many of our single point, room and duct room temperature sensors.*

whyBapi.bapiBackedDescription: Most sensor manufacturers will replace their defective products, but only BAPI has the confidence to go beyond the industry standard.
whyBapi.bapiBackedFootnote: 'BAPI-Backed' means we stand behind everything we sell, so be confident in the quality of our products that if one fails within the warranty period, we will not only repair or replace it, but we'll provide a product expert to offset your incurred cost.*

bapiOriginal.title: BAPI Original
bapiOriginal.description: At BAPI, we strive to be leaders in our industry by providing innovative, high quality products and services designed with you in mind.
bapiOriginal.footnote: Products displaying the "Another Original" stamp are unique to BAPI and the inspiration for these designs come from our valuable customers, talented employees and respected vendors. Those three ingredients combined create industry-leading, original solutions created to solve common HVACR problems.

globalPresence.title: Our Global Presence
globalPresence.subtitle: From our headquarters in Wisconsin to facilities across three continents, BAPI serves customers worldwide with local expertise and global reach.

requirements.rmaNumber: All returns must have an RMA number before shipping
requirements.timeframe: Products must be returned within 30 days of RMA authorization
